price: Enyi wake wa Nabii! Nyinyi si kama yeyote katika wanawake wengine. Kama mnamcha Mungu basi msiregeze sauti zenu, akaingia tamaa mwenye maradhi katika moyo wake. Na semeni maneno mema.
arabic: يَٰنِسَآءَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ لَسۡتُنَّ كَأَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ إِنِ ٱتَّقَيۡتُنَّۚ فَلَا تَخۡضَعۡنَ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ فَيَطۡمَعَ ٱلَّذِي فِي قَلۡبِهِۦ مَرَضٞ وَقُلۡنَ قَوۡلٗا مَّعۡرُوفٗا
footnotes: Enyi wake wa Mtume! Nyinyi si kama wanawake wengine kwa fadhila na utukufu. Kama mnataka uchamngu, basi msizungumze kwa maneno ya kuregeza sauti, hata ambaye ana uharibifu katika moyo wake akaingia tamaa. Kusema kwenu kuwe kama kawaida sio kujitia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yānisāa al-nabiyi lastunna ka-aḥadin mina al-nisāi ini ittaqaytunna falā takhḍaʿna bil-qawli fayaṭmaʿa alladhī fī qalbihi maraḍun waqul'na qawlan maʿrūfan
translations: lest should be moved with desire
